welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Saline, the charming city known for its small-town charm and friendly community. We invite you to explore our beautiful city and all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and executive flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Run Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Willow Run Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: McNamara Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lenawee County Airport serves all commercial flights and features modern amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
